title: GCF of Terms
text: Find the greatest common factor of all the terms of the polynomial.

title: Multiply Common Factors
text: Multiply the terms shared by both expressions. $$GCF=2\times2$$ $$GCF=4$$

title: Write each Term as a Product using GCF
text: Rewrite $$4x$$ and 12 as products of their GCF, 4. $$4x+12$$ $$4x+4\times3$$

title: Reverse Distributive Property
text: Use the reverse Distributive Property to factor the expression. $$4\left(x+3\right)$$
